original_text: It is people like this who cause you to argue with one another, so that you belong to separate groups. Their thoughts belong to this world. They do not have God's Spirit in them.
korean_text: 이 사람들은 분열을 일으키는 자며 육에 속한 자며 성령이 없는 자니라

sentences.original_text: who cause you to argue with one another
so that you belong to separate groups
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과 너희는 각기 다른 무리에 속하게 된다

sentences.original_text: Their thoughts belong to this world
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 생각은 이 세상에 속해 있다

sentences.original_text: They do not have God's Spirit in them
